meanings: (손으로 쥐다) hold (sth in one's hand), take, (꽉) grasp, grip, (literary) clasp, (갑작스레) grab, seize

phrases.phrase: 닭 잡는 데 소 잡는 칼을 쓰다
meanings: use a sledgehammer to kill a fly

phrases.phrase: 토끼 둘을 잡으려다가 하나도 못 잡는 다
meanings: (속담) If you run after two hares, you will catch neither.
